summary: Comprehensive testing of enhanced PDF pricing table application completed. Backend APIs working correctly with 1311 items loaded from PDF. Frontend UI fully functional with batch quotation, fuzzy matching, and comprehensive results display. All core features tested successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 422 instead of expected 400 for too many items validation
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - Pydantic validation returns 422 which is actually more correct than 400

passed_tests: PDF upload and parsing (1311 items loaded successfully)
Default PDF status tracking and display
Batch quotation with up to 15 items
Fuzzy matching with misspelled item names
Both 5% and limit values displayed correctly
Active value logic (5% preferred, fallback to limit)
Results table with all required columns
Search button state management (disabled when empty)
Comprehensive results display with status icons

success_percentage.backend: 95% (10/11 tests passed - minor validation status code difference)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI elements functional, integration working perfectly)
